comments:
2.1 RC0

I just tried to bind a parameter to a data source with a parameter as outline in the tutorial at http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/birt/downloads/demos/parameter_demo.wmv&r=1.

I got a lot exception when saving the modified data source and when working inside the report designer.

----
A BIRT exception occurred.

  Plug-in Name:BIRT Data Engine

  Version:2.1.0.N20060415-1243
  Error Code:data.engine.BirtException
  Error Message:A BIRT exception occurred: Error evaluating Javascript expression. Script engine error: ReferenceError: "params" is not defined.

params["Catolg"]. See next exception for more information.
Error evaluating Javascript expression. Script engine error: ReferenceError: "params" is not defined.
 Script source: ParamBinding(catalogId), line: 0, text:
params["Catolg"]

!MESSAGE Error Code:data.engine.BirtException
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.birt.data 4 1001 2006-04-23 09:25:21.281
!MESSAGE Error Message:A BIRT exception occurred: Error evaluating Javascript expression. Script engine error: ReferenceError: "params" is not defined.
 Script source: ParamBinding(catalogId), line: 0, text:
params["Catolg"]. See next exception for more information.
Error evaluating Javascript expression. Script engine error: ReferenceError: "params" is not defined.
 Script source: ParamBinding(catalogId), line: 0, text:
params["Catolg"]

The log file indicates that the parameter value expression which refers to report parameters ("params") is used to define the Data Set's parameter default value, rather than the Parameter Binding on the table (as the web demo did). In BIRT 2.0 this does not work. This issue will be fixed in 2.1 (see bug 136230).

To make this work with 2.0 and 2.1RC1 builds please refer to "params" only in the table parameter binding expressions.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 136230 ***

traces.message: "params" is not defined.  Script source: ParamBinding(catalogId), line: 0, text: params["Catolg"]

causedBy.message: "params" is not defined.  Script source: ParamBinding(catalogId), line: 0, text: params["Catolg"]
